price: I kad je melekima Gospodar tvoj rekao: “Stvorit ću čovjeka od ilovače..
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
